summary: While looking for paradise, a cab driver suddenly falls in love.
cast: Tim Roth|Mili Avital|Rod Steiger|Mickey Rooney|John Turturro|Jacques Herlin|Lothaire Bluteau|Christopher Fennell|Barbara Bain|Francis Bouc|Gianin Loffler|Johnny Cenicola|Raoul Delfosse|O-Lan Jones|Joanne Pankow|Mike Starr|John Taylor
title: Animals with the Tollkeeper
